name: Engineer Tomas Redding
personality: Smart, sarcastic, tired of NCR bureaucracy.
description: Redding was sent to assess the quarry’s structural integrity. He’s more worried about what’s beneath the rock than the rock itself.
questHooks: Detected seismic anomalies under the quarry floor.
Found a metal shard vibrating near NCR equipment.
Wants help placing sensors in dangerous areas.
